alert.note: Alert for Barrow; Forsyth; Gwinnett; Hall; Jackson (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 26 at 10:19PM EDT until March 26 at 11:00PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: The National Weather Service in Peachtree City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Barrow County in north central Georgia... Central Forsyth County in north central Georgia... Northeastern Gwinnett County in north central Georgia... Southern Hall County in north central Georgia... Western Jackson County in northeastern Georgia... * Until 1100 PM EDT. * At 1019 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Hog Mountain, or 7 miles north of Lawrenceville, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Gainesville, Winder, Jefferson, Sugar Hill, Suwanee, Buford, Braselton, Auburn, Flowery Branch, Dacula, Oakwood, Arcade, Hoschton, Pendergrass, Carl, Talmo, Rest Haven, Candler, Fort Yargo State Park and Harbin. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. If you see wind damage...hail or flooding...wait until the storm has passed...and then call the National Weather Service toll free at 1 8 6 6 7 6 3 4 4 6 6 or tweet us your report at NWSATLANTA.
